duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform daily campaign management of Digital Advertising for company-related property and clients, including optimization, troubleshooting, ad creation, and budget management.
Interact daily with internal & external teams, agencies, advertisers, sales, and vendors to handle creative assets, reporting, and process issues.
Provide performance reporting for clients, analyze delivery, and provide insights to leadership.
Represent the company's Marketing in client meetings, either in-person or remotely.
Maintain strong working relationships with Client Services, Product, Analytics, and Ad Ops teams, keeping them apprised of any issues impacting the larger business.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (B.A.) from a four-year college or university; or 2+ years related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience.
